body: as if a king of the lost belt with the power to kill a fucking kaiju with the power to destroy the world would give in to the pleasure of a stranger, don't misunderstand my words, I don't hate astolfo, he's actually one of my favorite servants, but that It doesn't make me like a shitty doujin that turns one of Chaldea's most loyal and charismatic ervants into a damn fuckboy who doesn't get enough of anything, you'd better have continued with your fat shit self-insertions, because deforming a good character to turn it into this just shows what a shitty person this author is
